details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.1 General - Suspects
details.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary containing an entry, Suspects, whose value shall be false.

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary containing an entry, Suspects, whose value shall be false.

error.message: Suspects entry of the MarkInfo dictionary is not present in the document catalog or is set to true
